(Trad.: 嗊)
Pictophonetic: 贡 indicates the sound; 口 (mouth) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 口 [ kǒu ] mouth; entrance, gate, opening
    • 贡 [ gòng ] to offer, to contribute; tribute, gifts

唝字的基本解释

唝
（嗊）
gòng
〔唝吥〕地名，在柬埔寨。
地名用字。

唝
（嗊）
hǒng
〔罗唝曲〕词牌名。亦称“望夫歌”。
（嗊）

唝
（嗊）
gǒng
推动，向上或向上推。

唝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hǒng］
［《廣韻》呼孔切，上董，曉。］
“唝1”的繁体字。
见“嗊嗃”。
[②]［gǒng］
“唝2”的繁体字。
(1)撅起，翘起。
(2)向前或向上推动。
[③]［gòng］
“唝3”的繁体字。
译音用字。如唝呸，一译贡不。柬埔寨海港。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hǒng］
["Guang Yun" Hu Kongqie, Shang Dong, Xiao. ]
"唝1" in traditional characters.
See "唝嗃".
[②]［gǒng］
"唝2" in traditional characters.
(1) Push up, cock up.
(2) Push forward or upward.
[③]［gòng］
"唝3" in traditional characters.
Transliteration of words. Such as 唝呸, a translation is not a tribute. Cambodian seaport.
